title: Add cat to heart memorial, bird to hexagon memorial, with black frames on all animal portraits

requirements.summary: Generate a new heart-shaped resin memorial image that includes a cat portrait (replacing or updating the Whiskers memorial image), retaining the existing flowers and grass decorations, with a black frame border surrounding the cat's portrait within the resin mold
acceptanceCriteria: The heart-shaped resin memorial displays a visible cat portrait
The cat portrait has a black frame/border around it within the mold
Flowers and grass decorations remain visible in the heart mold image

file_operations.description: Update the heart memorial shape card to reference the newly generated heart memorial image at frontend/public/assets/generated/whiskers-heart-memorial.dim_600x600.png which includes a cat portrait with a black frame and preserved floral decorations

requirements.summary: Generate a new hexagon-shaped resin memorial image that includes a bird portrait (replacing or updating the Tweety memorial image), retaining the existing flowers and grass decorations, with a black frame border surrounding the bird's portrait within the resin mold
acceptanceCriteria: The hexagon-shaped resin memorial displays a visible bird portrait
The bird portrait has a black frame/border around it within the mold
Flowers and grass decorations remain visible in the hexagon mold image

file_operations.description: Update the hexagon memorial shape card to reference the newly generated hexagon memorial image at frontend/public/assets/generated/tweety-hexagon-memorial.dim_600x600.png which includes a bird portrait with a black frame and preserved floral decorations

requirements.summary: Update the square resin memorial image (Nabi) so the animal portrait also has a black frame border surrounding it within the resin mold, consistent with the framing applied to the heart and hexagon memorials
acceptanceCriteria: The square resin memorial (Nabi) animal portrait is surrounded by a black frame within the mold
Existing flowers and grass decorations are preserved

file_operations.description: Update the square memorial shape card to reference the newly generated square memorial image at frontend/public/assets/generated/nabi-square-memorial.dim_600x600.png which includes a dog portrait with a black frame and preserved floral decorations

requirements.summary: Update the ShapeShowcases component to render the newly generated heart, hexagon, and square memorial images from frontend/public/assets/generated, replacing any previously used image sources for these three memorials
acceptanceCriteria: All three memorial shape cards in ShapeShowcases display the updated generated images
No broken image links are present

file_operations.description: Wire the three newly generated memorial images into the ShapeShowcases component by updating the src attributes for the square, heart, and hexagon shape cards to reference frontend/public/assets/generated/nabi-square-memorial.dim_600x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/whiskers-heart-memorial.dim_600x600.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/tweety-hexagon-memorial.dim_600x600.png respectively, ensuring all images are displayed correctly without broken links
